name: Defend the Town
description: A messenger from a nearby town asks for your help to defend against goblin attacks.

name: Speak to the Mayor
description: After defending the town, speak to the mayor for more information.

name: Find the Path to the Dragon
description: Gather information about the dragon's last known location.

name: Explore the Dark Forest
description: Wander the Dark Forest to face various enemies and get stronger.

name: Enter the Elven Village
description: The elves attack you on sight! Bring an elf to low health to speak with them.

name: Journey to the Mountain
description: Travel five times towards the mountain, facing dangerous enemies along the way.

name: Prepare for the Final Battle
description: Set up a camp at the mountain to rest and prepare.

name: Hunt the Dragon
description: Face the dragon in a final battle. Be well-equipped and strong enough to survive!

name: Return as a Hero
description: Return to town or choose to live among the elves.
